title: Leopard Raptors Breach the City · Plots Renewed at Camp

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and scroll unfurl effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, drifting spiritual motes, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第9集:豹禽破城·营地再谋。

scenes.description: 赤蟒连成巨弩,士兵举盾列阵抵挡雨点般的蟒身。

visual.composition: Scarlet pythons chain together like giant crossbows as soldiers raise shields to block the rain of bodies

scenes.prompt: Crimson pythons lash together like immense crossbows while shield-bearing soldiers hold the line against the downpour.
scenes.narration: 赤蟒如巨弩射上城墙,守军紧握盾牌硬顶。

scenes.description: 巨弩怒射丈许铁箭,将连锁蟒蛇贯穿坠落。

visual.composition: Great ballistae launch yard-long iron bolts that pierce the chained pythons and send them crashing down

scenes.prompt: Massive ballista bolts skewer the interlocked pythons and hurl them from the wall.
scenes.narration: 丈许铁箭穿透蟒群，暂时稳住了城头，守军士气稍振。

scenes.description: 韩立一刀斩碎变异巨蟒头颅,血雾遮天。

visual.composition: Han Li cleaves the mutant python’s head with one stroke, blood mist filling the air

scenes.prompt: Han Li’s blade flashes and the mutant python’s head erupts into a skyful of blood mist.
scenes.narration: 他寒光一闪，巨蟒首级瞬间化为血雾，威力惊人。

scenes.description: 巨蟒残尸突然抽尾偷袭,韩立金拳轰碎蟒尾。

visual.composition: The severed python corpse lashes its tail without warning and Han Li crushes it with a golden fist
visual.character_pose: Han Li punching through the tail

scenes.prompt: The severed python snaps its tail in ambush, but Han Li smashes it apart with his gilded fist.
scenes.narration: 蟒尾骤然抽来，他抬拳砸穿，化险为夷，反应迅速。

scenes.description: 韩立身影连闪,将三条突袭巨蟒先后击杀。

visual.composition: Han Li blurs across the wall, cutting down three ambushing pythons in succession

scenes.prompt: Han Li’s silhouette flickers as he dispatches three lunging pythons one after another.
scenes.narration: 他或掷刀或空拳，三条巨蟒瞬息毙命，战力强悍。

scenes.description: 空中修士与豹禽对峙,妖羽与雷火互相湮灭。

visual.composition: Cultivators and leopard raptors face off in the air, demonic feathers and thunderfire canceling each other
visual.environment: Skyline clash between cultivators and raptors

scenes.prompt: High above, cultivators and leopard birds stare each other down as demonic feathers and lightning flames annihilate midair.
scenes.narration: 空中僵持不下，雷火与妖羽互相消耗，战况胶着。

scenes.description: 雾化豹禽突然坠落,韩立仓促准备面对致命冲击。

visual.composition: A mist-wreathed leopard raptor plummets abruptly while Han Li hastily steels himself for impact
visual.character_pose: Han Li tensing for the hit

scenes.prompt: A vaporous leopard raptor drops out of the sky, forcing Han Li to ready himself for a lethal strike.
scenes.narration: 雾化豹禽无视灵器轰击,径直坠向韩立所在段。

scenes.description: 韩立犹豫是否动用灭仙珠,最终以金刚诀迎击。

visual.composition: Han Li hesitates about using the Extinction Pearl but decides to meet the strike with the Vajra Art

scenes.prompt: Han Li debates unleashing the Extinction Pearl, then resolves to bear the blow with his Vajra Art instead.
scenes.narration: 他舍不得王牌,只能催动金刚诀正面扛下。

scenes.description: 雾化豹禽撞碎城墙,绿雾席卷,士兵纷纷化作碧尸。

visual.composition: The vaporous leopard breaks the wall, unleashing green fog that turns soldiers into jade corpses

scenes.prompt: The mist-wreathed leopard raptor smashes through the wall and a green miasma sweeps soldiers into verdant corpses.
scenes.narration: 缺口轰然炸开,绿雾所过之处尸骨无存。

scenes.description: 豹禽与赤蟒趁势冲入缺口,城中防线瞬间崩溃。

visual.composition: Leopard raptors and crimson pythons flood through the breach, collapsing the inner defense

scenes.prompt: Leopard birds and crimson pythons surge through the opening and the city’s defenses crumble instantly.
scenes.narration: 妖禽与蟒潮涌入城内,人族防线顷刻崩溃。

scenes.description: 远处沙虫兽黄雾滚滚压境,修士们心如死灰。

visual.composition: Yellow fog from sand worm beasts rolls toward the city as cultivators’ hearts sink

scenes.prompt: Yellow mists from sand worm beasts surge closer, leaving the cultivators utterly hopeless.
scenes.narration: 黄沙滚滚，沙虫也赶来分食残城，场面混乱。

scenes.description: 锦袍修士提醒同伴各自退走,光头修士亦无奈离开。

visual.composition: The brocade-robed cultivator signals his companions to withdraw, and the bald monk departs reluctantly

scenes.prompt: The robed cultivator urges everyone to retreat separately, and even the bald monk withdraws with a sigh.
scenes.narration: 修士们彼此拱手，各自带人撤离，分道扬镳。

scenes.description: 城内四日被兽群肆虐,血火交织,随后妖兽退去。

visual.composition: The city endures four days of beast rampage, blood and flame intertwined before the monsters withdraw

scenes.prompt: For four days beasts ravage the city in a haze of blood and fire until they finally disperse.
scenes.narration: 安远城化为焦土,少量幸存者仓皇逃离。

scenes.description: 一队修士飞临缺口上方,寻找韩立踪迹。

visual.composition: A squad of cultivators flies above the breach, scanning for any trace of Han Li

scenes.prompt: A group of cultivators sweeps over the breach, searching for signs of Han Li.
scenes.narration: 兽潮退后,秦师兄等人赶来搜寻韩立。

scenes.description: 乱石堆炸裂,韩立背着女童破土而出。

visual.composition: A pile of rubble explodes as Han Li bursts out carrying the little girl on his back
visual.character_pose: Han Li emerging with the girl on his back

scenes.prompt: The rubble pile detonates and Han Li surfaces with the young girl on his back.
scenes.narration: 石堆轰然裂开,他带着小女童安然现身。

scenes.description: 韩立解释救下女童“黛儿”的经过,女孩紧抓衣襟。

visual.composition: Han Li recounts saving little Dai’er, the girl clutching tightly to his robe
visual.character_pose: Han Li holding the girl while explaining

scenes.prompt: Han Li explains how he rescued the girl Dai’er as she clings to his clothing.
scenes.narration: 他说城破时不忍其死,顺手救下了赵城主孙女。

scenes.description: 秦师兄暗赞金刚诀坚韧,邀请韩立随他离开。

visual.composition: Senior Brother Qin quietly praises the toughness of the Vajra Art and invites Han Li to leave with him

scenes.prompt: Senior Brother Qin lauds Han Li’s Vajra resilience and subtly invites him to depart together.
scenes.narration: 秦师兄赞其肉身惊人,婉言相邀同行。

scenes.description: 韩立抱起女童,女子修士尝试接手却被黛儿躲避。

visual.composition: Han Li lifts the girl while a female cultivator tries to take her, but Dai’er hides away

scenes.prompt: Han Li picks up the girl; when a female cultivator reaches for her, Dai’er dodges and clings tighter.
scenes.narration: 女童只认韩立，死死抱住不肯松手，不愿离开。

scenes.description: 众人御器腾空离去,法器光幕裹住韩立与女童。

visual.composition: Everyone rises on their artifacts, a glowing shield wrapping around Han Li and the child

scenes.prompt: They lift off on artifacts, a luminous barrier encasing Han Li and the girl as they leave the ruins.
scenes.narration: 秦师兄开启法器护罩,带着二人飞往安全营地。

scenes.description: 丘陵营地广布帐篷,潘青与方夫人等人迎上前。

visual.composition: Tents sprawl across the hill camp as Pan Qing and Madam Fang walk forward to greet them

scenes.prompt: A hilltop camp filled with tents, with Pan Qing and Madam Fang stepping out to welcome the arrivals.
scenes.narration: 丘陵间扎满营帐,方夫人、潘青率众相迎。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath nightfall, spiritual light raining from the sky
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, drifting spirit particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第10集即将开始。
